instruction:
A task was given to a model, and the task as well as the model's response is as below. There's also the Golden response. Compare the model's response and golden response. Act as a judge and give a rating on [[10]] if the model's response matches the golden response otherwise give a rating of [[0]].

Strictly follow the output format below and maintain the square brackets.
```
"rating": "[[your-rating]]"
```
